ygData.subject: Re: HyperNEAT 3.0 C++ missing files
ygData.msgSnippet: sorry, i have got it. instead of /usr/include/wx-2.8/ i had put /usr/include/wx-2.8/wx/ i got it working now. just a suggestion, there are 2 commands in linux,

sorry, i have got it. 
instead of 
/usr/include/wx-2.8/
i had put
/usr/in=
clude/wx-2.8/wx/

i got it working now. just a suggestion, there are 2 comm=
ands in linux, they can give wxWidgets compiler options:

master wxw # wx-c=
onfig --libs
-L/usr/lib64 -pthread -Wl,-O1  -L/usr/lib64   -lwx_gtk2u_richt=
ext-2.8 -lwx_gtk2u_aui-2.8 -lwx_gtk2u_xrc-2.8 -lwx_gtk2u_qa-2.8 -lwx_gtk2u_=
html-2.8 -lwx_gtk2u_adv-2.8 -lwx_gtk2u_core-2.8 -lwx_baseu_xml-2.8 -lwx_bas=
eu_net-2.8 -lwx_baseu-2.8 
master wxw # wx-config --cxxflags
-I/usr/lib64/w=
x/include/gtk2-unicode-release-2.8 -I/usr/include/wx-2.8 -D_FILE_OFFSET_BIT=
S=3D64 -D_LARGE_FILES -D__WXGTK__ -pthread
master wxw # 

regards
